Articles.Content:
So, back when I started playing KSP, there were about 5 official krakens. A little while ago I checked and there were 15. Now there's 25. Almost all of the new ones have almost no information about them and honestly were all probably added by a single person who wanted to turn every known KSP bug into a kraken, even though half of the new krakens don't even harm your ship or kerbals.

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Deep_Space_Kraken
There was only ever one kraken that was even semi-official, and it was fixed years ago. (Ships got stretched and sometimes broken at high speeds.) Everything else is a player-made nickname.

Seriously, people need to stop calling every bug a "Kraken". I sort of get it, if it's a glitch in the physics engine, but this:

Quote

Startup Kraken

The Startup Kraken is when you first start the game. Rarely happens, found once in 1.0.5 unmodded. The game blanks out to a white screen, then stops responding.

Might as well have the "My hard drive failed" Kraken

54 minutes ago, severedsolo said:

Seriously, people need to stop calling every bug a "Kraken". I sort of get it, if it's a glitch in the physics engine, but this:

Might as well have the "My hard drive failed" Kraken

Or the "I didn't read the recommended computer specs" Kraken
